00062 #ifndef HASH_H
00063 #define HASH_H
00064 
00065 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00066 #include <config.h>
00067 #include <library/l_alloc_new.h>
00068 
00069 #define HASH_FUNC(value) ((value))
00070 /*
00071 #define HASH_FUNC(value) ((value)>>24 + (value)>>16 + (value)>>8 + (value))
00072 */
00073 typedef struct _hash_element {
00074   int key;
00075   void *ptr;
00076   struct _hash_element *next;
00077 } *HashElement, _HashElement;
00078 
00079 typedef struct _hash_table {
00080   unsigned int mask;
00081   HashElement *tbl;
00082 
00083   int key_indx;
00084   HashElement elem_indx;
00085 } *HashTable, _HashTable;
00086 
00087 #ifdef __cplusplus
00088 extern "C"
00089 {
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 /*====================
00093  * Hash Table Globals
00094  *====================*/
00095   extern L_Alloc_Pool *HashTablePool;
00096   extern L_Alloc_Pool *HashElementPool;
00097 
00098 /*====================
00099  * Function Prototypes
00100  *====================*/
00101   extern HashTable HashTable_create (int size);
00102   extern void HashTable_free (HashTable hash_table);
00103   extern void HashTable_free_func (HashTable hash_table,
00104                                    void (*ptr_free_func) (void *));
00105   extern void HashTable_reset (HashTable hash_table);
00106   extern void HashTable_reset_func (HashTable hash_table,
00107                                     void (*ptr_free_func) (void *));
00108   extern void *HashTable_find (HashTable hash_table, int key);
00109   extern void *HashTable_find_or_null (HashTable hash_table, int key);
00110   extern void HashTable_insert (HashTable hash_table, int key, void *ptr);
00111   extern int HashTable_member (HashTable hash_table, int key);
00112   extern void HashTable_update (HashTable hash_table, int key, void *ptr);
00113 
00114   extern void HashTable_start (HashTable hash_table);
00115   extern void *HashTable_next (HashTable hash_table);
00116   extern int HashTable_key (HashTable hash_table);
00117
